00022 /// @defgroup cpRotaryLimitJoint cpRotaryLimitJoint
00023 /// @{
00024 
00025 const cpConstraintClass *cpRotaryLimitJointGetClass();
00026 
00027 /// @private
00028 typedef struct cpRotaryLimitJoint {
00029         cpConstraint constraint;
00030         cpFloat min, max;
00031         
00032         cpFloat iSum;
00033                 
00034         cpFloat bias;
00035         cpFloat jAcc, jMax;
00036 } cpRotaryLimitJoint;
00037 
00038 /// Allocate a damped rotary limit joint.
00039 cpRotaryLimitJoint *cpRotaryLimitJointAlloc(void);
00040 /// Initialize a damped rotary limit joint.
00041 cpRotaryLimitJoint *cpRotaryLimitJointInit(cpRotaryLimitJoint *joint, cpBody *a, cpBody *b, cpFloat min, cpFloat max);
00042 /// Allocate and initialize a damped rotary limit joint.
00043 cpConstraint *cpRotaryLimitJointNew(cpBody *a, cpBody *b, cpFloat min, cpFloat max);
00044 
00045 CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpRotaryLimitJoint, cpFloat, min, Min);
00046 CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpRotaryLimitJoint, cpFloat, max, Max);
00047 
00048 /// @}
